text: One day, a handsome Prince rode into the forest on a majestic $session.params.word_15. He was wearing only a $session.params.word_16. He saw Snow White sleeping and was in love. To break the spell, he decided to $session.params.word_17 her. It worked! She woke up instantly. The Wicked Queen's promise was broken. She thanked everyone and gave them each a kiss. They hopped on the $session.params.word_15 and rode all the way to $session.params.word_18. There they begin their new life. Filled with love and joy. The End.
